alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 27 at 5:00AM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory today, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch this evening through early Tuesday morning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...South Central Mountains and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from 5 PM MST this afternoon through early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous crosswinds will impact northwest to southeast oriented roads like Highway 380 through Capitan and Lincoln, especially tonight.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
